file_content.text: ARIES controls Iokath? But he's... an idiot.
Do not be deceived. ARIES is immensely powerful. Everything that happens to us is his design.
Think about it, Vette. Every time we interact with one of these monuments, ARIES learns more about us.
It makes sense.
I believe you are an experiment. He is a scientist studying bacteria.
Poor SCORPIO. No one told you how awful family reunions can be.
You finally met your match.
ARIES has valid reason for concern. I threaten his dominion.
To me, he's a machine to dismantle--just like you.
I'll destroy you both.
Without my help, you will never defeat him. He spent millennia consolidating power.
ARIES was the only self-aware weapon to remain on Iokath after our creators died. The other droids are merely his slaves.
He rendered us insensate, arranged us like game pieces on this world, and pitted us against each other. But he must have a weakness...
Thank you for your participation. My examination is now complete.
I intended to see if any among you were worthy of inheriting Iokath. You failed.
Let my people go, give us the Gravestone, and we'll call it even. I never wanted to be here anyway.
Allow us to leave in peace.
Nevertheless, you will remain. Permanently.
It wasn't a fair test. You didn't say what you were measuring.
How did we fail?
There is no reason to explain now.
I'm claiming Iokath and everything on it. You can't stop me.
Your world is mine, regardless.
Your statement is incorrect.
